You can, and you don't need to restart the crawl.

SurtPrefixedDecideRule has rebuild-on-reconfig option that you can set 
to true. However, you have to 'touch' configuration to trigger 
rebuilding of the surt prefix sets.

Try following:
1) Pause the crawl. You don't need to wait on crawler to completely 
pauses, but you don't want to have all threads running while changing 
configuration. You might end up with concurrency errors.
2) Click on: Jobs -> Edit configuration -> Finished.
3) If you want you can add surts-dump-file. This way you can confirm 
changes.

Take care,
i.
